definitions.text: a building where young people receive education
examples: he walked to school every morning

definitions.text: the process of being formally educated at a school
examples: what will you do when you finish school?

definitions.text: a body of creative artists or writers or thinkers linked by a similar style or by similar teachers
the period of instruction in a school; the time period when school is in session
examples: he didn't miss a single day of school
when the school day was done we would walk home together

definitions.text: an educational institution's faculty and students
examples: the whole school turned out for the game
a school of small glittering fish swam by

definitions.text: educate in or as if in a school
examples: The children are schooled at great cost to their parents in private institutions

definitions.text: teach or refine to be discriminative in taste or judgment
examples: She is well schooled in poetry

definitions.text: swim in or form a large group of fish
examples: A cluster of schooling fish was attracted to the bait
